text: Static (Virgil Hawkins) is a fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. He is a superhero originally published by Milestone Media. The character was created by Dwayne McDuffie, Derek T. Dingle, Denys Cowan and Michael Davis, and first appeared in Static #1 (1993). == Fictional character biography == He is a Bang Baby from Dakota City, who has immensely advanced powers of electromagnetism. He has met and teamed up with numerous other Milestone heroes, and even occasionally participated on teams such as the Shadow Cabinet. He was absorbed into Mainstream Continuity after Infinite Crisis. He first appeared as a contestant in the Dark Side Club, and later became a member of the Teen Titans. Category:DC Comics characters
title: Static (DC Comics)
